database.dbname: The name of the database to connect to
database.user: The user to sign in as
database.host: The host to connect to. Values that start with / are for unix domain sockets.
database.sslmode: Whether or not to use SSL
database.fallback_application_name: An application_name to fall back to if one isn't provided.
database.connect_timeout: Maximum wait for connection, in seconds.
database.sslcert: Cert file location. The file must contain PEM encoded data.
database.sslkey: Key file location. The file must contain PEM encoded data.
database.sslrootcert: The location of the root certificate file. The file must contain PEM encoded data.
